description: A modern hospital with advanced medical technology, ample staff, and comprehensive diagnostic and treatment facilities, allowing for highly specialized care.
A well-equipped clinic or hospital with essential medical equipment and staff but limited access to highly specialized technology and services.
A very basic healthcare facility with minimal staff, limited diagnostic tools, and essential medications, focusing on primary and emergency care.
A crisis environment where medical resources are scarce, safety is compromised, and healthcare professionals provide urgent, life-saving care with minimal equipment.
